question: With reference to India’s culture and tradition, what is “Huyen Langlon”?
option1: It is an ancient martial art and a living tradition in some parts of South India
option2: It is an Indian martial art from Manipur
option3: It is a stick dance native to Andhra Pradesh
option4: It is a Clay relief work, a unique form of art practiced by tribal women in the Kutch area
answer: It is an Indian martial art from Manipur
explanation: Huyen Langlon is an Indian martial art from Manipur
